**`settings.py`**

```py
DATABASES = {
    'default': {
        'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.postgresql',
        'NAME': 'djangogirls',
        'USER': 'name',
        'PASSWORD': '',
        'HOST': 'localhost',
        'PORT': '',

```

## Installing PostgreSQL package for pyton

```py
pip install psycopg2-binary
```
